text_logic_form: Find the length of the line segment $AB$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the length of the line segment $AB$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line segment $BA$ is $2x+5$.
The length of the line segment $BC$ is $3x-4$.
The length of the line segment $AC$ is $27$.
The length of the line segment $BA$ is equal to the length of the line segment $BC$.
